My 100 Things in April, 2017

Wardrobe

Outwear

  1. grey wollen causal suit *autumn

Tops

  1. dark red shirt (Gold soldier) *autumn
  2. black undershirts *autumn
  3. black sweater *autumn
  4. black cardigan *autumn
  5. black short T-shirt (back)
  6. grey short T-shirt
  7. grey and white long T-shirt
  8. white and black stripe long T-shirt (UNIQLO)
  9. white and black stripe short T-shirt
  10. white and dark red stripe short T-shirt
  11. dark blue and white stripe short T-shirt
  12. grey shirt
  13. black shirt
  14. blue checked shirt

Pants & Shorts

  1. black long thick wide pants *autumn
  2. brown wollen medium pants *autumn
  3. black long underpants *autumn
  4. kaji long pants
  5. light blue long pants
  6. black long thin pants
  7. black long thin wide pants
  8. black and white stripe long pants
  9. black long tight pants
  10. white shorts
  11. black and white short shorts
  12. light blue long jeans (Only)

Dresses & skirt

  1. black long dress
  2. black medium skirt

Shoes

  1. black canvas shoes
  2. ascis running shoes

Underwear

  1. black braces
  2. black long silk stockings
  3. long stocks (6 pairs)
  4. short stocks (4 pairs)
  5. middle stocks
  6. black bra (2 pair)
  7. dark green bra
  8. flesh bra
  9. black panties (5)
  10. red panties
  11. light blue panties
  12. flesh panties

Bag

  1. Jansport Backpack
  2. Noritake canvas bag
  3. black leather tote bag
  4. Herschel Supply Travel Bag
  5. trunk

Scarf & Hat

  1. Scarf (dark green)

Life Tool

Accessories

  1. Wallet j(ousyu long zipper leather brown wallet)
  2. Watch (timex T2N651)
  3. Umbrealla (Muji)
  4. Bottle (Zojirushi)
  5. Year Planner
  6. Notebook (Moleskine)
  7. Ballpoint Pen (Muji)
  8. Fountain Pen (Pilot 78G)

Identity

  1. ID card
  2. Bank card

Bedding

  1. bed sheet (2 pair)
  2. quilt cover
  3. blue checked blanket
  4. Scarf (dark green)

Beauty

Skincare

  1. facial cleanser (Bio-essence)
  2. Toner (Opera)
  3. Treatment (Olay Regenerist)
  4. Cream (Neutrogena Retinol)
  5. Suncream (Sofina)

Make up

  1. makeup remover (Bio-essence)
  2. brush (tarte)
  3. CC-cream (Bio-essence)
  4. Cheeks (Canmake)
  5. Slim Create Powder (Kate)
  6. Powder (innesfress)
  7. Eye Brown
  8. Eyebrown Knife
  9. Eye line
  10. Concealer (Muji)
  11. Foundation (Givenchy Balm)
  12. Lipstick (Dior)
  13. Primer (Sofina)
  14. Make-up Bag

Teeth

  1. Brush (Phillips HX6721) + power
  2. Toothpaste

Hair & Body

  1. Hair Conditioner (Korres)
  2. Shampoo (L’OREAL)
  3. Body Lotion (YVES ROCHER)
  4. Lip (Mentholatum, Uriage)
  5. Hand (L’Occitane, maxam, Herbacin, Kao)

Electronics

  1. Iphone 6s 64g + power + case
  2. Kindle PaperWhite 2 + power + bag
  3. Macbook Air 11’ Early 2014 + power + bag
  4. Dell Vostro laptop + power
  5. Fuji x100s + power
  6. Apple EarPods
  7. Xiaomi Battery
